title: League of Legends MCP Server
description: Let AI coach you on League of Legends. Get personalized analysis of your matches, champion stats, and improvement tips — directly in Claude Desktop. ## 3-Step Setup 1. **Get your Riot API Key** → developer.riotgames.com (free, takes 30 seconds) 2. **Paste it below** and select your region 3. **Connect Claude Desktop** → Settings → Connectors → Add Custom Connector: `https://scrapmania--lol-mcp-server.apify.actor/mcp?token=YOUR_APIFY_TOKEN` ## What you can ask Claude - "I just lost 5 games in a row. Analyze what's going wrong — am I tilting or is there a real pattern?" - "Based on my last 50 games, build me an optimal 3-champion pool to climb in ranked" - "Compare me and my duo partner. Where do we complement each other? Where are we both weak?" - "I'm a support main thinking of switching to ADC. Look at my stats — am I ready?" - "Analyze my Jinx games vs my Caitlyn games. Which should I one-trick to reach Platinum?" - "Track my progress: compare my last 20 games vs the 20 before. Am I actually improving?"
